pull_request_title: Add User Interaction Components, Top 5 High Risks Panel, and Fix Navigation Links
summary: Complete implementation of AI query interface with verbosity/tone controls, Top 5 High Risks sidebar with CSV-based risk scoring, and fixed broken navigation links

files_changed.description: New component with 6 example query chips, verbosity control (Short/Medium/Long), tone toggle (Technical/Non-technical), and quick action buttons (Summarize, Extract Actions, Export JSON)
Right sidebar component displaying Top 5 high risks computed from QUASAR_Test_Data.csv with risk scores, explanations, recommended actions, and evidence snippets
Updated to include UserInteraction component at top and RightSidebarRisks in new two-column layout (main content + sidebar)
Fixed broken link: replaced HTML anchor tag with React Router Link component
Link audit report documenting all link fixes

test_steps: 2. Verify UserInteraction component appears at the top with 6 example query chips
3. Click any example chip to verify it auto-fills the input box
4. Test verbosity dropdown (Short/Medium/Long) and tone toggle (Technical/Non-technical)
5. Enter a query and click Submit to test the AI query handler
6. After response, verify Quick Action buttons (Summarize, Extract Actions, Export JSON) appear
7. Test Export JSON button to download response data
8. On desktop/larger screens, verify Top 5 High Risks panel appears on the right sidebar
9. Verify each risk card displays: rank, label, score badge, explanation, actions list, and evidence
10. Navigate to a non-existent route to verify 404 page uses proper Link component
assumptions: CSV structure: Assumed columns quantum_vulnerability_score (0-100) and quantum_risk_score (0-1) are the primary risk indicators
Risk scoring formula: composite_score = min(100, round((vulnerability_normalized * 0.6 + risk_normalized * 0.4) * 100))
Risk categorization: Based on current_status (legacy/post-quantum), cert_valid (expired/valid), and automation_status (manual/success)
Actions generation: Derived from asset status, certificate validity, automation status, and vulnerability score thresholds
AI integration: Mock responses used as placeholder; real implementation requires Lovable AI edge function connection
Responsive design: Right sidebar collapses on mobile/tablet views (< 1024px)
All changes are isolated to homepage/dashboard and do not affect other routes or components

technical_notes.risk_calculation: Uses quantum_vulnerability_score and quantum_risk_score with 60/40 weighting to compute composite risk scores
technical_notes.fallback_behavior: Static dummy data displayed if CSV parsing fails
technical_notes.export_format: JSON export includes query, response, verbosity, tone, and ISO timestamp
technical_notes.navigation_fix: Replaced HTML <a> tag with React Router <Link> for SPA compatibility
